29 EPUB3_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
30 
31 class NavigationElement;
32 
33 typedef shared_ptr<NavigationElement> NavigationElementPtr;
34 typedef shared_vector<NavigationElement> NavigationList;
35 
36 // abstract base for polymorphic navigation table/point classes
40 class NavigationElement
41 {
42 public:
43  explicit NavigationElement() : _children() {}
44  explicit NavigationElement(const NavigationElement& o) : _children(o._children) {}
45  explicit NavigationElement(NavigationElement&& o) : _children(std::move(o._children)) {}
46  virtual ~NavigationElement() {}
47 
48  virtual const string& Title() const = 0;
49  virtual void SetTitle(const string& str) = 0;
50  virtual void SetTitle(string&& str) = 0;
51 
52  const NavigationList& Children() const { return _children; }
53 
54  void AppendChild(shared_ptr<NavigationElement> e) { _children.push_back(e); }
55 
56 protected:
57  NavigationList _children;
58 };
59 
60 EPUB3_END_NAMESPACE

62 #endif
